```{r}
library(here)
library(patchwork)
library(cowplot)

library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
Maaslin2_Heatmap_Species_without_confounders <-
  readRDS(here("Plaque538_Combined/Plaque538_16S/Plaque538_16S_A4_LM/Maaslin2_Heatmap_Species_without_confounders.rds"))

Maaslin2_Heatmap_Genus_without_confounders <-
  readRDS(here("Plaque538_Combined/Plaque538_16S/Plaque538_16S_A4_LM/Maaslin2_Heatmap_Genus_without_confounders.rds"))

```

```{r}

layout <- "
AAAAAACCCC
AAAAAABBBB
"

# Combine the plots
combined_Maaslin2_Species_Genus_heatmap <- free(Maaslin2_Heatmap_Species_without_confounders) + 
  annotate("text", x = 1, y = 1, label = expression(paste("*", italic("q"), "-value < 0.01")), hjust = 1.2, vjust = 16, size = 6, colour = "black") +
  annotate("text", x = 1, y = 1, label = expression(paste("**", italic("q"), "-value < 0.001")), hjust = 1.1, vjust = 18, size = 6, colour = "black") +
  Maaslin2_Heatmap_Genus_without_confounders +
  
  guide_area()  +
  plot_layout(guides = 'collect', design = layout) +
  plot_annotation(tag_levels = "A") & 
  theme(plot.tag = element_text(size = 30)) 

# Apply a global theme with larger tag text
theme_set(theme_light() )

ggsave(here("Plaque538_Combined/Plaque538_16S/Plaque538_16S_A4_LM/combined_Maaslin2_Species_Genus_heatmap.png"), 
       combined_Maaslin2_Species_Genus_heatmap,
       width = 55, height = 64, units = "cm", dpi = 600)
ggsave(here("Plaque538_Combined/Plaque538_16S/Plaque538_16S_A4_LM/combined_Maaslin2_Species_Genus_heatmap.tiff"), 
       combined_Maaslin2_Species_Genus_heatmap,
       width = 55, height = 64, units = "cm", dpi = 600)
```
